intro.greeting: Welcome to RESTO-BOT! We help you and your friends choose the best restaurant to visit.
intro.details: REST-BOT allows you and your friends to choose what restaurant you want to visit. One friend starts a session while the others join the session. Then, RESTO-BOT will  will provide 10 restaurant recommendations based on the provided location, and each friend will vote 👍 or 👎. At the end, RESTO-BOT will recommend the restaurant that the most amount of friends voted they wanted to dine at.

menu.new_session: I want to start a new session with my friends
menu.join_session: I want to join my friend's session

begin_session.intro: Your session code is { sessionCode }, please provide this to your friends and tell them to start a new message with me. When all your friends have joined, please say 'start'
begin_session.join_friend: Please provide me your friend's session code to continue

verify_code.fail: The code you provided is incorrect. Please provide another code or start a new session

main_session.location_ask: To start, please provide me the name of your address to search for the nearest restaurants near you
main_session.location_error: The location you provided is not valid. Please try another one
main_session.location_valid: Understood. We will now give you 10 restaurants from your city. Press 👍 if you like the option and 👎 if you don't
main_session.wait_for_friends: You're all done voting. Please wait for your friends to finish voting

finalize_session.results: The results are in! We recommend you and your friends dine at:
